mapper.select: SELECT AA.* FROM (SELECT 'LOGIN' AS LOG_TYPE , ALOG_DTTM , '' AS MENU_ID , '' AS MENU_NM , '' AS PRGM_ID , '' AS PRGM_NM FROM T_SYTM_LOGIN_LOG WHERE USER_ID = #{USER_ID} AND LOIN_FLAG_CD = '0010' UNION ALL SELECT 'LOGOUT' AS LOG_TYPE , CL.ALOG_DTTM , '' AS MENU_ID , '' AS MENU_NM , '' AS PRGM_ID , '' AS PRGM_NM FROM T_SYTM_LOGIN_LOG CL WHERE CL.USER_ID = #{USER_ID} AND CL.LOIN_FLAG_CD = '0020' UNION ALL SELECT 'MENU' AS LOG_TYPE , CPL.ALOG_DTTM , CPL.MENU_ID , MN.MENU_NM , CPL.PRGM_ID , PR.PRGM_NM FROM T_SYTM_PRGM_LOG CPL ,T_SYTM_MENU MN ,T_SYTM_PRGM PR WHERE MN.MENU_ID = CPL.MENU_ID AND PR.PRGM_ID = CPL.PRGM_ID AND CPL.USER_ID = #{USER_ID} )AA WHERE 1=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(ALOG_DTTM, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -7 DAY), '%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') ORDER BY AA.ALOG_DTTM DESC

SELECT CONCAT(' ', OS_CD) AS OS_CD , COUNT(*) AS OS_CNT , '0' AS OS_SELECT FROM T_SYTM_LOGIN_LOG WHERE 1=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(ALOG_DTTM, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH) , '%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') AND SYTM_FLAG_CD = 'PC' AND OS_CD IS NOT NULL GROUP BY OS_CD ORDER BY OS_CD

SELECT CONCAT(' ', BROWSER_CD) AS BROWSER_CD , COUNT(*) AS BROWSER_CNT , '0' AS BROWSER_SELECT FROM T_SYTM_LOGIN_LOG WHERE 1=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(ALOG_DTTM, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH) , '%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') AND SYTM_FLAG_CD = 'PC' AND BROWSER_CD IS NOT NULL GROUP BY BROWSER_CD ORDER BY BROWSER_CD

SELECT a.SCREEN , a.N_WIDTH , a.N_HEIGHT , COUNT(*) AS SCREEN_CNT , '0' AS SCREEN_SELECT FROM ( SELECT SCREEN_WIDTH AS N_WIDTH , SCREEN_HEIGHT AS N_HEIGHT , CONCAT(' ', SCREEN_WIDTH , '*' , SCREEN_HEIGHT) AS SCREEN FROM T_SYTM_LOGIN_LOG WHERE 1=1
AND DATE_FORMAT(ALOG_DTTM, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH) , '%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') AND SYTM_FLAG_CD = 'PC' AND SCREEN_WIDTH >= 1024 -- ORDER BY N_WIDTH ) a GROUP BY a.SCREEN , a.N_WIDTH, a.N_HEIGHT ORDER BY a.N_WIDTH
